channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump administration touts ‘most secure border in history’ as 2.5 million migrants exit US

item.title: Tim Scott tells MAGA voters Trump ‘is on the ballot’ as GOP fights to grow Senate majority in 2026
item.description: Sen. Tim Scott tells MAGA voters Trump is "on the ballot" as GOP aims to expand Senate majority in 2026 midterms, with affordability as key issue.

item.title: Meet the Gen Xer who lives on a boat—she supercommutes to California every few weeks for her $100-an-hour job. Just eight shifts cover all her bills

item.title: Why Rescheduling Cannabis Falls Short
item.description: Federal law continues to insist that marijuana is a controlled substance — a contradiction with state laws rescheduling does not resolve.

item.title: Wyoming GOP Sen. Lummis will not run for reelection
item.description: Sen. Cynthia Lummis, Wyoming Republican, announced Friday that she will not run for reelection in 2026, citing a "change of heart."

item.title: The Lesson of Judge Dugan’s Obstruction Case
item.description: The immunity that public officials need to do their jobs is not a get-out-of-jail-free card for their nonofficial acts.

item.title: The DNC Refuses to Learn from 2024
item.description: If they showed you their election autopsy, then you’d know what’s in it.

item.title: Chaplains Punished For Mentioning Jesus Cheer Hegseth’s Return To God-Focused Ministry
item.description: The chaplain brings God to the fight, offering something bigger for the soldier to hold on to. It is something an atheist can't offer.

item.title: Rep. Elise Stefanik drops out of New York's governor race, no reelection bid for House
item.description: Rep. Elise Stefanik has suspended her campaign for New York governorand said she will not be seeking reelection for her House seat, either.

item.title: The Bernie Sanders Plan to Sabotage the Future
item.description: We are in the equivalent of a space race, and the Vermont socialist is talking about cutting off our supply of rocket fuel.
